ProductInfo.Features:
ACTi E44 (2MP Bullet with D/N, IR, Basic WDR, SLLS, Vari-focal lens, f2.8-12mm/F1.4, H.264, 1080p/30fps, DNR, PoE, IP66)
Progressive Scan CMOS with Superior Low Light Sensitivity | Day and night function with mechanical IR cut filter | Minimum illumination 0 lux with IR LED on
Built-in f2.8~12mm / F1.4 Megapixel vari-focal lens | 30 fps at 1920 x 1080 resolution | Selectable H.264 HP, MJPEG compressions with dual streaming
Video Motion Detection | Basic WDR | Weatherproof IP66 rated casing
Powered by PoE Class 2
